pages.text: Shipwrecks lay on the $(l:biomes/beach)beach$() or have sunken to the $(l:biomes/ocean)ocean$() floor a long time ago. They come in a variety of wood types, rotations and decaying states.$(br2)They contain up to three $(l:blocks/chest)chests$(): a supply chest, a $(l:items/map)map$() chest and a treasure chest. While the supply chest is useless most of the time, both map and treasure are worth being searched for.
